amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to increase and decrease TSA's Operations and Support account to highlight opposition of further deployment of facial recognition technology for domestic travel at TSA checkpoints.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (AL) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore (AL) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
